attributes.action: PASS A LAW TO STOP ANYONE FROM SCOTLAND BECOMING PRIME MINISTER OF WHAT IS RAPIDLY BECOMING ENGLAND AND THE OTHER BITS OF WHAT USED TO BE THE UNITED KINGDOM.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters. They make the text very hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
